name: Classic | Chair - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: As the name itself suggests, this piece is one of Ceccotti Collezioni's timeless classics. Designed by the company's celebrated artistic director Roberto Lazzeroni in 2001. Classic has a simple and linear aesthetic that makes it perfect for any setting, such as the home or a hotel room and for any d√©cor style. A chair with a polyurethane foam padded backrest and seat, available in four versions: with or without armrests and with high or standard backrest height. Upholstery options include fabric, leather, or natural leather. The solid American walnut wood base and legs are available in a wide array of finishes.
